Author: _Fr0gg0_
Text: I relate! My husband told me that he doesnt like my underweight body because it looks soo bony and sickly.   Yet if I'm at a healthy weight I feel fat and gross and uncomfortable with my body during sexy time. :(  At the same time, when i told him my dr wanted to refer me out to an ED clinic he said he thought my dr was over reacting.   Hang in there, you're not alone
